Company info

In 2009 I founded KiUX. The name is procounced: Key U-X. Ki is Tibetan for “life force” and UX stands for User Experience. My aim is to design and create elegant online user experiences that work.

KiUX chamber of commerce (KvK) number: 34369415
KiUX VAT (BTW) number: 134025969-B01
